import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from "axios" import RecipeList from './RecipeList'; import { MDBNavbar, MDBNavbarBrand, MDBNavbarNav, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink, MDBNavbarToggler, MDBCollapse, MDBFormInline, MDBDropdown, MDBDropdownToggle, MDBDropdownMenu, MDBDropdownItem } from "mdbreact"; // import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Home ({props}){ // const apiKey = "5be7b142c0faea901956bd642929df69"; // const apiId = "1ba68463"; const [recipe, setRecipe] = useState([]); const [search, setSearch] = useState(''); const [query, setQuery] = useState('chicken'); const mealUrl = `https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/search.php?s=${query}`; useEffect(() => { getRecipe() }, [query]) const getRecipe = () => { axios.get(mealUrl) // .then(response => console.log(response.data.meals)) .then(response => setRecipe(response.data.meals)) } const getSearch = (event) => { setSearch(event.target.value) } const updateChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setQuery(search) } return (
